verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, Altaschith <WH516> <WH8686>, A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> of Asaph <WH623>. Unto thee, O 'Elohim <WH430>, do we give thanks <WH3034> <WH8689>, unto thee do we give thanks <WH3034> <WH8689>: for that thy name <WH8034> is near <WH7138> thy wondrous works <WH6381> <WH8737> declare <WH5608> <WH8765>.
When I shall receive <WH3947> <WH8799> the congregation <WH4150> I will judge <WH8199> <WH8799> uprightly <WH4339>.
The earth <WH776> and all the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> thereof are dissolved <WH4127> <WH8737>: I bear up <WH8505> <WH8765> the pillars <WH5982> of it. Selah <WH5542>.
I said <WH559> <WH8804> unto the fools <WH1984> <WH8802>, Deal not foolishly <WH1984> <WH8799>: and to the wicked <WH7563>, Lift not up <WH7311> <WH8686> the shofar <WH7161>:
Lift not up <WH7311> <WH8686> your shofar <WH7161> on high <WH4791>: speak <WH1696> <WH8762> not with a stiff <WH6277> neck <WH6677>.
For promotion <WH7311> <WH8687> <WH8676> <WH2022> cometh neither from the east <WH4161>, nor from the west <WH4628>, nor from the south <WH4057>.
But 'Elohim <WH430> is the judge <WH8199> <WH8802>: he putteth down <WH8213> <WH8686> one, and setteth up <WH7311> <WH8686> another.

For in the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> there is a cup <WH3563>, and the wine <WH3196> is red <WH2560> <WH8804>; it is full <WH4392> of mixture <WH4538>; and he poureth out <WH5064> <WH8686> of the same <WH2088>: but the dregs <WH8105> thereof, all the wicked <WH7563> of the earth <WH776> shall wring them out <WH4680> <WH8799>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> them.
But I will declare <WH5046> <WH8686> for ever <WH5769>; I will sing praises <WH2167> <WH8762> to the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290>.
All the shofars <WH7161> of the wicked <WH7563> also will I cut off <WH1438> <WH8762>; but the shofars <WH7161> of the righteous <WH6662> shall be exalted <WH7311> <WH8783>.
